content: SeedlyTV EP06 CPF Property Asked by Gabriel ThamAsked on 07 Jun 2019If the govt really wants to cool the private property market, why not put a stop to allowing CPF for private property? This will stop alot of ppl selling HDB for millions then buying private property3 answersAnswerBump1
Answers (3)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Serene TohLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 09 Jun 2019They want to cool the market not crash it.
If the property market goes down too drastically, the Developers will be affected, and government can’t sell land at high price to get funds anymore.
Not to mention our high earning REIT’s might be affected.0 comments0
James Yeo, Founder at SmallCapAsia.comLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 07 Jun 2019Then the same ppl will kb why i cannot use my cpf for big amts like buying property hehhe0 comments0
